page.title: 13A NURSERY FARMER IN ELMSTEAD
page.content: The owners of{Chapel Grove Nursery sell most of their produce to {Spitalfield Market}in{London.}They grow{tomatoes,cabbages,celery, {cucumbers,and marrows.}The present owners moved there 4 years ago,when two thirds of the land was wood and one third was barren.For the first year they lived in a caravan. Since then they have put up{six greenhouses, {2 plastic tunnels, 1 packing shed}and their own{house.} In the summer, all the vegetable are watered every afternoon.To remind the owner to do this he has a calculator with an alarm,it is set every half hour.Some of the equipment they use includes a{tractor,}a{rotavator,}a {planter,}a{blocking machine}and {irrigation pumps.}The owners also keep {chickens,ducks}and{geese}and they sell their eggs locally.
